message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_SAME_PRIORITIES
message.locale: This priority already exists for another skill.

message.name: ERR_NO_PRIMARY_PRIORITY
message.locale: Primary priority must be captured before Secondary and Tertiary.

message.name: ERR_NO_SECONDARY_PRIORITY
message.locale: Secondary priority must be captured before Tertiary.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_PRIORITY_SKILL
message.locale: Skill Priorities must be set to No Allocations before deletion.

message.name: INFO_PRIORITY_SWAP
message.locale: The modified skill has had its priority flipped. Please make sure that this was intended.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGIN_ID_MISSING
message.locale: 'Azure Active Directory Username' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGIN_ID_SIZE
message.locale: Azure Active Directory Username cannot be more than 64 characters.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGIN_ID_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: Azure Active Directory Username must be unique.

message.name: ERR_NO_POST_TRAINING_MONITOR_PRIMARY
message.locale: Post training monitoring- Secondary selected without having Post training Monitoring – Primary.

message.name: ERR_MAX_PRIORITY_SKILLS
message.locale: A maximum of three skills (VSGs) can be prioritized excluding 'No Allocation', per user.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_SAME_POST_TRAINING_MONITOR
message.locale: Users can have only one 'Post Training Monitoring – Primary' and one 'Post Training Monitoring – Secondary'.
